segments.text: Nice and easy . Just give it a little gas .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First you have to put the car into gear . Move this shifter so the arrow points at D for drive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do these other letters mean ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: R is for reverse , P is for park , and D1 and D2 are lower gears for going through snow , or up a steep hill .
segments.speaker: S2
